sourcesContent:
<template>
  <header>
    <button @click="toggleSidebar()">xxx</button>
  </header>
</template>
<script >
export default { 
  data() {
    return {
      sidebarOpen: true
    };
  },
  methods: {
    toggleSidebar() {
      this.sidebarOpen = !this.sidebarOpen;
      this.emitter.emit("toggle-sidebar", this.sidebarOpen);
    }
  }
};
</script>
